question: According to Wechsler intelligence scale scoring, average IQ of a normal child is:
exp: Ans. c. 90 (Ref: Niraj Ahuja 6/e p169: Kaplan & Sadock 9/e p980). According to Wechsler intelligence scale scoring, average IQ of a normal child is 90. Wechsler Intelligence Scale. IQ Score.
